item.title: An unnecessary analysis of the song bye by me // vaundy
item.description: bye by me, or is it bye bye me?> bye by me, or is it bye bye me? # The lyrics start with the word Monday, indicating the start of the speaker’s day (or in this case, the singer). Followed by question: where are you going? For Tuesday, do you have work today? Until Friday, questions are asked. which gives me the following themes: An elderly gentleman, who suffers from Alzheimer’s.
